text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text: It's finally time for the monumental end-of-year race, the Arima Kinen!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Fans are excited to see the sisters Biwa Hayahide and Narita Brian 
face each other after their previous matchup fell through!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text: The stands are packed! This is the race that no one wants to miss!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: What a profound feeling to have finally made it to this day.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Yeah, I've been waiting for this a long time.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
I've completed my winning equation. Don't think I'll concede this 
victory just because you're my sister.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: You're always overthinking things. Our race isn't that complicated.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Chuckleâ€¦ True enough. We've been heading to this moment since we were kids.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Shall we go resolve our little sibling rivalry?
